extendedInfo.description: Do you feel dehydrated at the end of the day?  Then Drink More Water is the app for you.  Drink More Water will help track and remind you to drink enough water throughout the day. Features include:  Imperial (oz) or Metric (ml) units  Home screen widget  A progress bar to show you how much you've water you've consumed for the current day.  Customizable buttons that allow you to add to the amount of water you've consumed.  Customizable reminders that will remind you at the time convenient for you.  Graphs to chart your progress over a week or a month.We'll be making additional improvements over the next few weeks.  Please contact us if you have any suggestions support@firecrackersw.com

reviews.title: Gastric Surgery Recovery
reviews.comment: I had a really tough time finding an app to help me get enough water after my surgery (installed 4 apps before this one),since I can only drink 1 oz of water every 15 minutes I need a reminder (I can\'t make it up later). This the l only one I could schedule the reminders I needed This app took a long time to setup the reminders for a whole day(I needed 60 reminders) in addition to the fact that the number pad entry did not save. It saves only when I used the up/down number selector. Otherwise it is working like a charm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget is just a shortcut to the app
reviews.comment: I was loooking for something I could quickly use from my home screen. This widget just opens the app.
reviews.author: Amanda Kincaid

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Did not like the way it was set up. But you might like it. I wanted to set a high water goal ans said to much water.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it, but cant use it
reviews.comment: I cant open it up\357\274\214it always shows \342\200\234has closed\342\200\235

reviews.title: Delete function
reviews.comment: Add delete/undo function please. Accidently pressed 1000ml instead of 100ml. No way back??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Delete Button
reviews.comment: Maybe it should have delete or undo button.
reviews.author: Ash Erande

reviews.title: ok app
reviews.comment: the app is good but there needs to be an undo button when you make a mistake.   This is only a tracking app not a reminder to drink water.
reviews.author: David McClendon

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Mohamed Irshad

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have been always using it...
reviews.author: Varun Neelaboina

reviews.comment: Deleting this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ive tried a few water apps & this one\'s simple & effective. Can schedule reminders, nice notification sound. Would like ability to edit past data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easiest Water App
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a few other water apps but this one lets the users effortlessly customize the oz or ml to how they drink. Easy to use right from the start!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice looking app but it doesn\'t automatically notify you, you must program your own reminders in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app, but TOO MANY Ad Networks
reviews.comment: Loved the app, did exactly what I needed, but used so many ad networks, I finally uninstalled. Wish you would provide a paid, no ad option, I\'d buy it in a heartbeat. And give a 5-star rating then.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, Improvements needed
reviews.comment: The app definitely helps me ensure that I am consuming the appropriate amount of liquids.  It would be nice to be able to update previous days\' consumptions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best on the Market but, Not Perfect
reviews.comment: I do love the features that this has and, the option to add your own water intervals and have reminders is great but, the inability to edit water consumption from previous days is absolutely aggravating if you\'re tracking your water on a daily basis. It can really throw off your chart if you miss the midnight cut off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I tried several apps & this one is my favorite for tracking water intake. Allows you to enter consumption by ounces instead of just a cup so its exact
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Digging it, it\'s nice to be able to track my hydration. One thing: if you meet ur goal before ur reminders are done they should stop reminding you ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says, but needs proper grammar
reviews.comment: It\'s an app to help you track how much water you\'ve drunk each day. Works like it says; no complaints here except a request to use the right word on the reminder message. It says \'you haven\'t drank any water\' or \'you\'ve drank 12/64 oz\', etc. It should be drunk, not drank. Considering that\'s virtually the only written (non-number) part of the app, it shouldn\'t be too difficult to be grammatically correct.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Drunk/Drank
reviews.comment: Do not correct the word drank. You are using the correct verb. Great app. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User
